org.apache.dubbo.common.serialize

Interface Serialization

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Serialization
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AvroSerialization, CompactedJavaSerialization, FastJsonSerialization, FstSerialization, GenericProtobufSerialization, GsonSerialization, Hessian2Serialization, Hessian2Serialization, JavaSerialization, KryoSerialization, NativeJavaSerialization, ProtostuffSerialization

    @SPI(value="hessian2")
public interface Serialization
    Serialization strategy interface that specifies a serializer. (SPI, Singleton, ThreadSafe) The default extension is hessian2 and the default serialization implementation of the dubbo protocol. 
         e.g. <dubbo:protocol serialization="xxx" />
